author: Tam Ngo
comment: Needs work on the Moto 360. Please include an option to remove the numbers. If you could make the other rotors for hours and minutes appear "behind" the seconds instead of a "ghost" effect, that would look much better. Thank you for your hard work!

reply.author: kenz
reply.content:
Thanks your advices.
I will get the Moto 360 and I try your advices.

title: Cool idea

author: J.R. TRAKRMN
comment: Could you make an Android app or widget for my phone like this?  This would be a must have! Thanks.
title: Love the idea!

author: Joshua Wiwsyk
comment: I cannot get this on my galaxy gear 2 watch please help

reply.author: kenz
reply.content:
Sorry.
This app is only support for Android Wear.
